thread.title: Larry Belt
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Larry Belt

author: Larry Belt
title: Larry Belt
text: I ordered 3 pieces. I reported one damaged right away. They have not replaced it, as of yet as promised. I have had to place mutiple calls to get it done. I don't have time for this. Its suppose to be here Monday. We will see.
